Posts.Content: Apr 18, 2015 11:14PM midwestmom wrote: Hi all, I read this forum last year when I was investigating IT Herceptin for my mom's leptomeningeal metastases.  She has been on the treatment for a while now, and I am happy to share her experience if anyone is interested.
Posts.Title: Intrathecal (IT) Herceptin for brain mets marvass hhfp
